# Humanstxt
# Team

Designer & developer: Oliver Gustavsson <oliver.gustavssons@gmail.com>
Github: https://github.com/dr-fluff
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/olivergustvs/
Location: Goteborg, Sweden

Designer & developer: Jakob Frykmer <jakob.frykmer@gmail.com>
Github: https://github.com/Peduncle
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jakobfrykmer/
Location: Goteborg, Sweden

---

# TECHNOLOGY

## Software

- Intelij
- Git + Github
- Gulp
- Browsersync
- UglifyJS
- Markdown

## Hosting
